original_text: They shall enter into my sanctuary, and they shall come near to my table, to minister unto me, and they shall keep my charge.
korean_text: 그들이 내 성소에 들어오며 또 내 상에 가까이 나아와 내게 수종들어 내가 맡긴 직분을 지키되

sentences.original_text: They shall enter into my sanctuary
and they shall come near to my table
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 내 상 가까이 나아올 것이라

sentences.original_text: and they shall keep my charge
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 나의 직분을 지킬 것이라
